talentList.name: Spiritual Focus
talentList.description: Gives your Flash of Light and Holy Light spells a v0% chance to not lose casting time when you take damage.

talentList.name: Divine Favor
talentList.description: When activated, gives your next Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock spell a 100% critical effect chance.

talentList.name: Aura Mastery
talentList.description: Increases the radius of your Auras to 40 yards.

talentList.name: Improved Lay on Hands
talentList.description: Gives the target of your Lay on Hands spell a v0% bonus to their armor value from items for 2 min. In addition, the cooldown for your Lay on Hands spell is reduced by v1 min.

talentList.name: Healing Light
talentList.description: Increases the amount healed by your Holy Light and Flash of Light spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Blessing of Wisdom
talentList.description: Increases the effect of your Blessing of Wisdom spell by v0%.

talentList.name: Divine Intellect
talentList.description: Increases your total Intellect by v0%.

talentList.name: Divine Strength
talentList.description: Increases your total Strength by v0%

talentList.name: Illumination
talentList.description: After getting a critical effect from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock heal spell, gives you a v0% chance to gain Mana equal to 60% of the base cost of your spell.

talentList.name: Improved Seal of Righteousness
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your Seal of Righteousness and Judgement of Righteousness by v0%.

talentList.name: Sanctified Light
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Holy Light spell by v0%.

talentList.name: Holy Shock
talentList.description: Blasts the target with Holy energy, causing 277 to 299 Holy damage to an enemy, or 351 to 379 healing to an ally.

talentList.name: Holy Power
talentList.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Unyielding Faith
talentList.description: Increases your chance to resist Fear and Disorient effects by an additional v0%.

talentList.name: Pure of Heart
talentList.description: Increases your resistance to Curse and Disease effects by v0%.

talentList.name: Purifying Power
talentList.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Cleanse and Consecration spells by v0% and increases the critical strike chance of your Exorcism and Holy Wrath spells by v1%.

talentList.name: Light's Grace
talentList.description: Gives your Holy Light spell a v0% chance to reduce the cast time of your next Holy Light spell by 0.5 sec. This effect lasts 15 sec.

talentList.name: Blessed Life
talentList.description: All attacks against you have a v0% chance to cause half damage.

talentList.name: Holy Guidance
talentList.description: Increases your spell damage and healing by v0% of your total Intellect.

talentList.name: Divine Illumination
talentList.description: Reduces the mana cost of all spells by 50% for 15 sec.

talentList.name: Redoubt
talentList.description: Damaging melee and ranged attacks against you have a 10% chance to increase your chance to block by v0%.  Lasts 10 sec or 5 blocks.

talentList.name: Improved Devotion Aura
talentList.description: Increases the armor bonus of your Devotion Aura by v0%.

talentList.name: Toughness
talentList.description: Increases your armor value from items by v0%.

talentList.name: Shield Specialization
talentList.description: Increases the amount of damage absorbed by your shield by v0%.

talentList.name: Guardian's Favor
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Blessing of Protection by v0 sec and increases the duration of your Blessing of Freedom by v1 sec.

talentList.name: Reckoning
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% chance after being hit by any damaging attack that the next 4 weapon swings within 8 sec will generate an additional attack.

talentList.name: One-Handed Weapon Specialization
talentList.description: Increases all damage you deal when a one-handed melee weapon is equipped by v0%.

talentList.name: Holy Shield
talentList.description: Increases chance to block by 30% for 10 sec and deals 59 Holy damage for each attack blocked while active. Damage caused by Holy Shield causes 35% additional threat. Each block expends a charge. 4 charges.

talentList.name: Blessing of Sanctuary
talentList.description: Places a Blessing on the friendly target, reducing damage dealt from all sources by up to 10 for 10 min.  In addition, when the target blocks a melee attack the attacker will take 14 Holy damage. Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

talentList.name: Blessing of Kings
talentList.description: Places a Blessing on the friendly target, increasing total stats by 10% for 10 min. Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

talentList.name: Improved Righteous Fury
talentList.description: While Righteous Fury is active, all damage taken is reduced by v0% and increases the amount of threat generated by your Righteous Fury spell by v1%.

talentList.name: Improved Hammer of Justice
talentList.description: Decreases the cooldown of your Hammer of Justice spell by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Concentration Aura
talentList.description: Increases the effect of your Concentration Aura by an additional v0% and reduces the duration of any Silence or Interrupt effect used against an affected group member by v1%.  The duration reduction does not stack with any other effects.

talentList.name: Anticipation
talentList.description: Increases your Defense skill by v0.

talentList.name: Precision
talentList.description: Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by v0%.

talentList.name: Stoicism
talentList.description: Increases your resistance to Stun effects by an additional v0% and reduces the chance your spells will be dispelled by an additional v1%.

talentList.name: Spell Warding
talentList.description: All spell damage taken is reduced by v0%.

talentList.name: Sacred Duty
talentList.description: Increases your total Stamina by v0%, reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield spell by v1 sec and reduces the attack speed penalty by v2%.

talentList.name: Improved Holy Shield
talentList.description: Increases damage caused by your Holy Shield by v0% and increases the number of charges of your Holy Shield by v1.

talentList.name: Ardent Defender
talentList.description: When you have less than 35% health, all damage taken is reduced by v0%.

talentList.name: Combat Expertise
talentList.description: Increases your expertise by v0, total Stamina by v1%.

talentList.name: Avenger's Shield
talentList.description: Hurls a holy shield at the enemy, dealing 270 to 330 Holy damage, dazing them and then jumping to nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets. Lasts 6 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Blessing of Might
talentList.description: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Blessing of Might by v0%.

talentList.name: Vengeance
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% bonus to Physical and Holy damage you deal for v1 sec after dealing a critical strike from a weapon swing, spell or ability. This effect stacks up to 3 times

talentList.name: Deflection
talentList.description: Increases your Parry chance by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Retribution Aura
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your Retribution Aura by v0%.

talentList.name: Benediction
talentList.description: Reduces the Mana cost of your Judgement and Seal spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Sanctity Aura
talentList.description: Increases Holy damage done by party members within 30 yards by 10%. Players may only have one Aura on them per Paladin at any one time.

talentList.name: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
talentList.description: Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by v0%.

talentList.name: Conviction
talentList.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by v0%.

talentList.name: Repentance
talentList.description: Puts the enemy target in a state of meditation, incapacitating them for up to 6 sec. Any damage caused will awaken the target. Only works against Humanoids.

talentList.name: Improved Seal of the Crusader
talentList.description: In addition to the normal effect, your Judgement of the Crusader spell will also increase the critical strike chance of all attacks made against that target by an additional v0%.

talentList.name: Seal of Command
talentList.description:
Gives the Paladin a chance to deal additional Holy damage equal to 70% of normal weapon damage. Only one Seal can be active on the Paladin at any one time. Lasts 30 sec.

Unleashing this Seal's energy will judge an enemy, instantly causing 68 to 73 Holy damage, 137 to 146 if the target is stunned or incapacitated.

talentList.name: Improved Judgement
talentList.description: Decreases the cooldown of your Judgement spell by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Eye for an Eye
talentList.description: All spell criticals against you cause v0% of the damage taken to the caster as well. The damage caused by Eye for an Eye will not exceed 50% of the Paladin's total health.

talentList.name: Vindication
talentList.description: Gives the Paladin's damaging melee attacks a chance to reduce the target's attributes by v0% for 15 sec.

talentList.name: Pursuit of Justice
talentList.description: Reduces the chance you'll be hit by spells by v0% and increases movement and mounted movement speed by v1%. This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.

talentList.name: Crusade
talentList.description: Increases all damage caused against Humanoids, Demons, Undead and Elementals by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Sanctity Aura
talentList.description: The amount of damage caused by targets affected by Sanctity Aura is increased by v0%.

talentList.name: Sanctified Judgement
talentList.description: Gives your Judgement spell a v0% chance to return 80% of the mana cost of the judged seal.

talentList.name: Sanctified Seals
talentList.description: Increases your chance to critically hit with all spells and attacks by v0% and reduces the chance your Seals will be dispelled by v1%.

talentList.name: Divine Purpose
talentList.description: Melee and ranged critical strikes against you cause v0% less damage.

talentList.name: Fanaticism
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of all Judgements capable of a critical hit by v0% and reduces threat caused by all actions by v1% except when under the effects of Righteous Fury.

talentList.name: Crusader Strike
talentList.description: An instant strike that causes 110% weapon damage and refreshes all Judgements on the target.
